revision.text: :*{{c|DI_SKIPICON}} - don't check for '''Icon''' :*{{c|DI_SKIPALTICON}} - don't check for '''AltIcon''' :*{{c|DI_SKIPSPAWN}} - don't check for Spawn state sprite :*{{c|DI_SKIPREADY}} - don't check for Ready state sprite :*{{c|DI_ALTICONFIRST}} - look for '''AltIcon''' first; only if not availble look for '''Icon''' :*{{c|DI_FORCESCALE}} - don't apply scale to the icon {{verification}}<noinclude>[[Category:Include templates]]</noinclude>
